page.title: 04MY PASTIME.
page.content: My pastime is modeling aircraft,tanks, and ships.I buy a model kit some glue and paint.I paint the pieces inside that need painting and put the transfers on.I take it upstairs with the rest of my collection and get an old board like plywood or chipboard. I mix some plaster of paris and put it onto the board.I build a trench and put my soliders into place and my tanks.I make sure that the pieces are in place then I leave it to dry.I paint it brown and green for the grass and black for explosions of shells.For ships I build another plaster paris board and put my ships on.When it is dry I paint it blue,with white for foam I also build airfields with buildings and place my aeroplanes on the runway. ROBERT ATKINSON AGE 10.
